title: 106_hr5039
content: Title II: Additional Improvements - Delays from July to November 2000 the deadline for withdrawing the offer, rescinding the withdrawal, of MedicareChoice plans for 2001. Amends SSA title XVIII part C to revise data collection requirements under the MedicareChoice program with regard to: (1) issuance of encounter data submission, (2) post-stabilization guidelines, (3) effectiveness of elections and changes of elections, (4) uniform premium and benefits. And (5) MedicareChoice program compatibility with employer or union group health plans.
